attributes.action: reject the definition of main residence secretly codified by the house committee which  allows peers to claim main residence if only visited once a month
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reference for this petition is Sunday Times  Main News section page 28 14th february 2010. The definition of a main residence is clearly ridiculous and says that only a visit to a property with no obligation to stay overnight, on one day a month when House of Lords sitting allows residence to qualify as the main home

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
